name: Robot Evolution League
description:
Created for GoGodot Jam 3.

Robot Evolution league is a fighting game where you can upgrade your robot to make it stronger, faster, more durable, and more capable. Choose your upgrades wisely to make it through the 10 rounds. 

CONTROLS:

The game supports keyboard and mouse along with Xbox, Dualshock, and Nintendo controllers.

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys / DPad / Left Joystick

Punch / Accept: Space / XBOX A / PlayStation X / Nintendo B

Ability: Control / XBOX B/ PlayStation O / Nintendo A

Cancel: Escape / XBOX B/ PlayStation O / Nintendo A
